import React, { useState } from 'react'; import * as emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; function AddressForm(props) { function submitBtn(e) { e.preventDefault(); const message = 'Email:' + email + ' Address:' + address + ' City:' + city + ' State:' + st + ' Zip:' + zip; let templateParams = { from_name: 'ashby.kyle@gmail.com', to_name: '', subject: 'shirt order', message_html: message }; emailjs.send( 'gmail', 'lekiki_trend_t_shirt', templateParams, ' user_ZNRCkUWp1sx3jKPQ1AAV1' ); } return (

Please enter your email & shipping info

setEmail(e.target.value)} required />

); } export default AddressForm;
